titles.title: COMMS Act
COMMS Act
Communications Outreach Media and Mail Standards Act
COMMS Act
COMMS Act
Communications Outreach Media and Mail Standards Act
Communications Outreach Media and Mail Standards Act

To rename the House Commission on Congressional Mailing Standards as the House Communications Standards Commission, to extend the authority of the Commission to regulate mass mailings of Members and Members-elect of the House of Representatives to all unsolicited mass communications of Members and Members-elect of the House, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Reform, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Mrs. Davis (CA) asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Committee on Oversight and Reform discharged.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary:
Communications Outreach Media and Mail Standards Act or the COMMS Act
This bill renames the House Commission on Congressional Mailing Standards as the House Communications Standards Commission and expands the commission's authority with respect to regulating certain mass mailings of Members of the House of Representatives.
